headline: Is 3M (MMM) Pricing In Restructuring Progress And Legal Settlement Risks?
summary: Wondering whether 3M's current share price really reflects what you are getting as an investor? This article will walk through how the stock stacks up against several valuation checks so you can judge that for yourself. 3M shares last closed at US$167.94, with returns of 2.7% over 7 days, a 0.6% decline over 30 days, 3.8% year to date, 27.1% over 1 year, 73.4% over 3 years and 45.9% over 5 years. Recent news around 3M has focused on ongoing restructuring efforts, portfolio simplification and...
